Articles.Content: I'm pretty bad at this whole modding thing, and when I start up KSP now, it says KAS is out of date. I go to the new Curse site, and I cannot locate Kerbal Attachment System. Can somone help? I can hardly play without it.

I'm pretty bad at this whole modding thing, and when I start up KSP now, it says KAS is out of date. I go to the new Curse site, and I cannot locate Kerbal Attachment System. Can somone help? I can hardly play without it.

You won't find KAS on Curse as Majiir, its maintainer, is one of the many modders that are not interested in using Curse.
